featured.text: The man was severely injured in last weekend’s tragic car accident and died _____ afterwards.
our plan for the weekend picnic because of the bad weather.
I am studying so hard for the forthcoming entrance exam that I do not have the of a free weekend to rest.
To invite Tom to join a weekend family get-together.
Mom and Dad are coming here for a weekend next month.

definition.zh_def: 週末，通常指星期六和星期日的兩天，許多人在這段時間休息或進行娛樂活動。
definition.en_def: The period from Friday evening to Sunday night, typically regarded as a time for rest or leisure activities.
definition.example: I love to spend my weekend hiking in the mountains.
